title: Introducing New Zealand
brief_description: A survey of New Zealand showing the scenery, primary and secondary industries, cities and towns during the 1950s. Stresses that the economy of the country rested on exports of meat, wool and dairy produce. Shows some of the recreational activities of the people including football, bush walking, sailing and fishing.
